1152.content: Alright, who do we follow for this story?
1152.title: Mortal Kombat

choices: A week passes by with still no fixed pipes
She gets stuck in a traffic jam and has to use the bathroom
11531.content:
Cammy was one of the cleanest and smoothest women one could think of. Shiny skin, well kept hair, and smelled fresher than new flowers. However, this clean reputation of her's wasn't going to last long...

Cammy woke up in her bed that morning, ready for another day at her job. After a nice breakfast, Cammy hopped in the show and prepared to wash herself. However, the water didn't seem to start up.

"Strange, why is no water coming out?" she thought. She checked several faucets and to her dismay, it seemed as though the water pipes in her house were broken.

"Great, I don't know if I have enough money to fix them right now," she groaned. She went to her bathroom cupboard and took out some deodorant, but was even more disappointed when she learned that she ran out.

"Ah, well, I can't be too dirty today," she thought. She put on some new clothes as she walked out the door. Already, she was a bit untidy, with unsheveled hair, smelly pits and dry skin, but it was gonna get dirtier from here...
11531.title: Cammy's Life

choices: She gets in a fight, and finds it increasingly useful
She visits Sakura, but her pipes are in disrepair too!
115311.content:
After a week with no fixed pipes, it was safe to say that Cammy was not looking her most elegant. Plumber after plumber had made an appointment, only to cancel at the last possible minute, and Cammy's stubborn pride kept her from going to somewhere where her hygiene could be maintained.

And the worst part?

Deep down, a tiny little piece of Cammy was starting to like it.

After just a week, Cammy was hardly a garbage dump, but with a daily 4-hour workout routine, she knew she soon would be, and yet... getting up in the morning, and pulling the same shirt over her head, she couldn't deny that there was something a little taboo about the pungent aroma her armpits produced. As the sweat stains of her shirt slid back into their place under her stubbly underarms, she realized with a slight pang of worry that she was becoming increasingly used to feeling the dampness they provided. However, turning to the mirror by her bedside reminded her of the less satisfactory parts of her new regime. Her unwashed hair was beginning to become thick with grease, although much of it was luckily concealed by her signature ponytail. She also noticed that the accumulated sweat, dirt and grime on her face has started to show create worrying signs of a spot infestation, or even worse, acne, although the few that currently existed were luckily localized to a few small parts of her forehead. Cammy was also pretty disgusted by the dirt and grit that had appeared under her fingernails and toenails, and worried about the difficulty of removing it once her pipes (and cleanliness) came back.

Wort of all though, at least in Cammys eyes, was the deteriorating state of her mouth. Without any water, Cammy was resorting to picking the worst of meals out of her teeth with toothpicks, but that hadn't stopped the buildup of plaque, as her teeth were already beginning to lose their carefully maintained whiteness and sheen. Cupping her hand to her mouth, Cammy attempted to smell her breath, but, in her clumsy, early morning stupor, accidentally burped instead, forcing her to confront the growing bacteria in her mouth, and causing her to gag on her own gas.

"Gosh, this new lifestyle of mine has really GOT to change"

Sniffing her underarm and sighing wistfully, Cammy set out to finally get cleaned up, however...
115311.title: A week passes by with still no fixed pipes

115331.content: Who will star in this gross tale?
115331.title: Soul Calibur

choices: Tira gives Sophitia guidance on how she's supposed to befoul herself.
Sophitia sets off on her quest to become gross.
1153311.content:
Sophitia sat in her home. She had such a nice, quiet, simple life. After venturing out many times to stop Soul Edge, it felt good to settle down with her husband and children, enjoying the pleasant future ahead of her provided by serving Hephaestus faithfully.

Or so she thought. The sound of a bladed weapon drew her attention to a dark corner of the house. When a strange woman with black hair and a bladed hula hoop stepped out, Sophitia got up from her chair.

"You!" She shouted.

Tira stood there, grinning. "Hi again. Remember me?"

"You bet I do!" Sophitia reached for her sword, to find, to her horror, that it was gone! On top of it, in the time it took her to reach, Tira had closed the gap and shoved her face up to hers.

"I could kill you in your sleep if I wanted. Your family too. I'm giving you a chance to avoid that if you'll do one little thing for me."

Sophitia didn't like the sound of that. Any time an evil creature like Tira wanted something, it always led to horrible consequences. She could take getting killed or tortured, but with her family on the line, she caved. "What do you want from me?"

Tira giggled fiendishly. "Soul Edge wants you to serve it, but I have another condition. You're a beautiful, well-behaved mother. It makes me sick. It's time you went on a quest, Sophitia, to make a name for yourself as the grossest, nastiest woman ever born."

The stunned Greece swordswoman went pale at Tira's demand.
1153311.title: Sophitia Alexandra Grosses Out, The Beginning

choices: A dirty swamp (she must bathe in it)
A tree with gassy fruit (which she must eat)
11533112.content:
Sophitia gulped as Tira drew her sword away, as she she took heavy breaths.

"Grossest... woman? How?" she asked.

"Oh, it's very simple. Tomorrow you will embark early in the morning on a quest to the Red Mountains, where the Soul Edge currently resides. I'll be watching you the whole time. The further you go on I'll drop some signs at certain places that will give you instruction on how to become a disgusting woman. By the time you arrive at Edge you should be a pretty gross pig"

"Fine... I guess. I must say goodbye to my family tomorrow, though"

"That is fine, but you must not tell them at all where you're going or what your disgusting quest is. If I hear one peep about that you'll be dead in seconds"

Sophitia just nodded as Tira cackled. Suddenly a shadow flashed and Tira was gone. Sophitia just sighed as she prepared herself for the journey that night.

The next morning, Sophitia said her goodbyes to her family, as she started off on a secret quest. Walking deep within a forest path, she came across her first stop...
11533112.title: Sophitia sets off on her quest to become gross.

choices: A hot sweat sauna (she must sleep in it)
a smelly, hair-growing mud pit (she must rub it into her armpits and crotch)
115331122.content:
Sophitia stared at the sign, pointing to a bunch of ripe, juicy apples hanging from a nearby tree. She walked up to it, confused, snapping one of the apples from its branch. She sought some sign of danger from the beautiful fruit, and came up with nothing.

"Well, I did leave my home in a hurry. Tira must want to make certain I don't starve before I can become as gross as she wants me to be," she surmised.

She took a single crisp bite into the apple. Juice dribbled down her chin, and the tasty treat went down her throat easy. Bite after bite, she ate her way down until the apple was nothing but its core. She threw it aside, wiped her lips and sighed.

"That was a good snack. If I had a big enough bag, I would"

PFFFTT!

Sophitia blushed and darted her hands to the back of her toga, catching her ruffling skirt and pulling it down. She looked around, and gave another relieved sigh. "Thank the gods nobody was around to see or hear that. My future is already grim enough without me helping it along."

Continuing on, she took a few more steps down the forest path when a blowhorn's worth of booming sound ripped out of her ass.

Wide-eyed, she watched birds flap their wings in fear away from the monstrous warning blowing out her butt. She stood fixed and frozen for the next full minute, and when her ass finally came to an eerie quiet, she held her face in shame. The thought of farting all the way down the street of the next town she visited horrified her, but as a warrior and a mother, she pressed on until she reached...
115331122.title: A tree with gassy fruit (which she must eat)

1153321.content: Which persona 4 characters do you want to see gross out?
1153321.title: Persona 4

11533211.content:
Yukiko Amagi heiress to the famous Amagi hotspring inn, was, due to her heritage, her wealth, and general personality, one of the healthiest and most hygeinic people you could ever expect to meet. As a young, intelligent and beautiful girl, she was popular with both boys and girls alike. But her heritance had had always felt more like an obligation than a calling, and she has yet to do some truly innovative with the Amagi inn.Which was why the information on the pamphlet she was handed whilst travelling back from school troubled her so much.

Are you Tired of the stuffy Amagi inn?

Do you want to know what REAL comfort feels like?

Then visit the hayabusa inn, home of relaxation!

Come to our opening at Junes on Monday and get FREE gym membership for a month!

A competitor? with it's own gym? Who had enough money to invest in something like that in inaba? They can't seriously think that people would just abandon the Amagi inn after years of custom,she thought to herself. or would they? Due to school and other commitments, she had failed to do anything revolutionary with the inn, and they had been hemorrhaging customers, and, unlike this new inn, they weren't located in a department store."Think yukiko, think, what advantage do we have over these guys" she whispered under her breath
" Oh hey I have an idea" Rise said. Yukiko jumped backwards, looking at rise.
" how long have you been standing there rise?" she said angrily
"Oh around 10 minutes, I didn't want to interrupt you hyperventilating and cursing under your breath. That inn sounds pretty cool doesn't it?"
" It most certainly does not, do you have any idea what this could mean for my families business?"
"Oh I joke, I came to apologize for that little spat we had over yu, thought I would try and repair our friendship. You wan't a advantage? I'm Risette, Japans teen sensation, Think about the money a free promotion could give to your business."
It seemed fortune had smiled on Yukiko, she was just given the potential Savior to her inn, gift wrapped for her. She eyed up rise greedily. For once, the cameras would report some positive news about the inn." when can you call your people?" She said.
"OK, firstly, if we're gonna be as close as you and Chie you're gonna need to stop looking at me like that and secondly, from the way your panicking over one leaflet, your probably overreacting. I've dealt with competitors in the past, and what I'll say is that they're never as good as you build them up in your head, how about we start with something small, like going to their launch on Monday? It's only too days away and they're hardly going to bankrupt you when they're not open yet."Yukiko looked worried for a second, but she realized rise was right.She could take the weekend off, bathe in the hotsprings and come to that launch on monday, fresh and ready to conquer.Meanwhile, Rise prepare for her debut as the face of her inn.

.

11533222211.content:
Princess Nadia of Guardia, known to her friends as Marle, was known as a rather rebellious girl who often snuck out of the castle to have fun. As a princess, of course, Marle was expected to maintain a high standard of hygiene, one of the few requirements of her station that she complied with without objection.

Of course, she was also known for journeying through time with her friends to stop an extraterrestrial parasite, but you knew that already.

At the moment, Marle and her friends Crono and Lucca were on yet another time-hopping journey, attempting to locate Crono's mother and cats, who had vanished into the timestream during the celebration of their triumph.

Well, that was a general overview of what she was doing anyway. What she was specifically doing at that exact point in time happened to be hogging the washroom at the local inn.

"Come on, Marle," Lucca complained as she pounded on the door, "You've been in there for over an hour."

Soon, with the sound of water shutting off, Marle stepped out of the washroom.

"Finally," Lucca sighed, "What were you even doing in there? We were supposed to leave 45 minutes ago."

"Well, I have to take my time to stay fresh, you know." Marle 'explained'.

"I swear, we'd have finished this quest a long time ago if you would stop holding us up at every stop," Lucca mumbled, and then got a mischievous glint in her eye as an idea came to her head. "Actually, are you up for a little bet?"

"What kind of bet?" Marle asked, clearly interested.

"If you can stay out of the washroom completely for one month, I'll make you whatever you want. But if you cave, I get to use your... 'connections' for my own ends."

Marle didn't like the sound of that, but Lucca could potentially build her just about anything, and besides, she wasn't one to turn down a bet, so she simply smiled and said "You're on!"
11533222211.title: Marle - It started as a bet

122121.content:
Ppppprrrrrrrrrrtttt "ah that felt good" Sakura said after waking up for the morning.

"Dear Sakura, please enjoy these pancakes. Your dad and I are going to be gone for the next few days, we have food for you in the fridge and please take a shower your starting to stink. ~Mebuki"
"Oh yeah time to dig in." Sakura said
After 30 mins of stufing her face Sakura let out a huge burp

"Man I wish I didn't have to spend so much energy feeding myself maybe I can get someone to help." Sakura said
Who does Sakura go for.

14.title: TV/Movies

info.brief_description: Make female characters from video games, anime, TV, movies, comics, etc look/act gross.
info.description:
This is an interactive story where everyone can focus on making the characters look and act gross and disgusting. You can make it something the characters want or something forced on them to humiliate them. Any amount of sexual content and any fetishes are allowed, no matter what you want.

The only request I make is that the weight gain fetish is avoided if possible. There are hundreds of weight gain interactives and none that make the women slobby and gross without gaining weight.
